Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: The trigger frequency for the primary internal camera trigger generator (Line0), which is also the frequency for an enabled trigger output (Line1). Only used when TriggerSource is set to Line0.
Float.Description: The trigger frequency for the primary internal camera trigger generator (Line0), which is also the frequency for an enabled trigger output (Line1). Only used when TriggerSource is set to Line0.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Trigger source, selected between internal trigger generator (Line0) or available external triggering modes
Enumeration.Description: Trigger source, selected between internal trigger generator (Line0) or available external triggering modes

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line0 represents the internal trigger generator
EnumEntry.Description: Line0 represents the internal trigger generator

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line1 represents the external trigger line (if set to Input mode)
EnumEntry.Description: Line1 represents the external trigger line (if set to Input mode)

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Software triggering via TCP, use TriggerSoftware command to emit
EnumEntry.Description: Software triggering via TCP, use TriggerSoftware command to emit

Enumeration.Name: ExposureTimeSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for exposure time. Left and right camera are always tied, but on three-sensor models, the settings for the center (color) camera can be set independently.
Enumeration.Description: Selector for exposure time. Left and right camera are always tied, but on three-sensor models, the settings for the center (color) camera can be set independently.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for gain. Left and right camera are always tied, but on three-sensor models, the settings for the center (color) camera can be set independently.
Enumeration.Description: Selector for gain. Left and right camera are always tied, but on three-sensor models, the settings for the center (color) camera can be set independently.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for color channel to white balance; Red or Blue (Green is reference).
Enumeration.Description: Selector for color channel to white balance; Red or Blue (Green is reference).

Float.Name: BalanceRatio
Float.ToolTip: White balance factor, relative to a constant Green of 1.0.
Float.Description: White balance factor, relative to a constant Green of 1.0.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Auto white balance mode; Continuous activates a simple gray-world algorithm.
Enumeration.Description: Auto white balance mode; Continuous activates a simple gray-world algorithm.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: The pixel format for the component. This is not necessarily identical to InputPixelFormat: converted / debayered output from the FPGA will always arrive as Mono8, Mono12, or RGB8.

IntSwissKnife.Name: ThirdCameraPresent
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Indicates whether this is a three-camera Nerian device.
IntSwissKnife.Description: Indicates whether this is a three-camera Nerian device.

Enumeration.Name: IntensitySource
Enumeration.ToolTip: The camera to dedicate to the Intensity purpose of a GenTL multipart stream (other active channel is appended with Custom0 purpose). Auto setting prefers color camera, if that channel is activated.
Enumeration.Description: The camera to dedicate to the Intensity purpose of a GenTL multipart stream (other active channel is appended with Custom0 purpose). Auto setting prefers color camera, if that channel is activated.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for the (virtual) digital I/O lines. Line0 is the primary internal camera trigger, Line1 is the external trigger I/O connection.
Enumeration.Description: Selector for the (virtual) digital I/O lines. Line0 is the primary internal camera trigger, Line1 is the external trigger I/O connection.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Mode for digital I/O. Line0 (primary internal camera trigger) is always in Output mode. Line1 operates as a secondary Output, or as the hardware trigger Input (on devices that support it).
Enumeration.Description: Mode for digital I/O. Line0 (primary internal camera trigger) is always in Output mode. Line1 operates as a secondary Output, or as the hardware trigger Input (on devices that support it).

Enumeration.Name: LineInverter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Inverter for the selected output line. False means active-high, True means active-low.
Enumeration.Description: Inverter for the selected output line. False means active-high, True means active-low.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Output source for the given I/O line (unless set to Input mode). FrameTrigger: emit internal trigger with configured AcquisitionFrameRate; UserOutput0: emit constant logical 0 (before any inversion); UserOutput1: emit constant logical 1 (before any inversion).
Enumeration.Description: Output source for the given I/O line (unless set to Input mode). FrameTrigger: emit internal trigger with configured AcquisitionFrameRate; UserOutput0: emit constant logical 0 (before any inversion); UserOutput1: emit constant logical 1 (before any inversion).

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for the user output data, set to constant 0 and 1 for emitting constant levels if configured.
Enumeration.Description: Selector for the user output data, set to constant 0 and 1 for emitting constant levels if configured.

Enumeration.Name: LinePulseWidthSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for accessing the n-th pulse width when LinePulseWidthAlternationMode is 'Cycle'. A zero width terminates the alternation sequence.
Enumeration.Description: Selector for accessing the n-th pulse width when LinePulseWidthAlternationMode is 'Cycle'. A zero width terminates the alternation sequence.

Enumeration.Name: LinePulseWidthAlternationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Activate or deactivate the cycling through a configured sequence of pulse widths for subsequent trigger output events.
Enumeration.Description: Activate or deactivate the cycling through a configured sequence of pulse widths for subsequent trigger output events.

Integer.Name: LinePulseWidth
Integer.ToolTip: The n-th pulse width when LinePulseWidthAlternationMode is 'Cycle'. A zero width terminates the alternation sequence.

Enumeration.Name: InputPixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: The pixel format for the stereo camera sensors. Not the same as the output PixelFormat: the FPGA may convert the format.
Enumeration.Description: The pixel format for the stereo camera sensors. Not the same as the output PixelFormat: the FPGA may convert the format.

Integer.Name: NumberOfDisparities
Integer.ToolTip: The horizontal range in pixels for which correspondences can be found, sethigher to allow measurement of closer objects. Influences available frame rate and available image sizes.
Integer.Description: The horizontal range in pixels for which correspondences can be found, set higher to allow measurement of closer objects. Influences available frame rate and available image sizes.

Integer.Name: DisparityOffset
Integer.ToolTip: The minimum disparity for successful matching. Non-zero values allow measuring closer objects, at the expense of not detecting the most distant objects. Influences available image sizes.
Integer.Description: The minimum disparity for successful matching. Non-zero values allow measuring closer objects, at the expense of not detecting the most distant objects. Influences available image sizes.

Integer.Name: SgmP1NoEdge
Integer.ToolTip: The SGM P1 penalty parameter for small disparity changes, where not at an edge in the image
Integer.Description: The SGM P1 penalty parameter for small disparity changes, where not at an edge in the image

Integer.Name: SgmP1Edge
Integer.ToolTip: The SGM P1 penalty parameter for small disparity changes, where at a detected edge in the image
Integer.Description: The SGM P1 penalty parameter for small disparity changes, where at a detected edge in the image

Integer.Name: SgmP2NoEdge
Integer.ToolTip: The SGM P2 penalty parameter for larger disparity changes, where not at an edge in the image
Integer.Description: The SGM P2 penalty parameter for larger disparity changes, where not at an edge in the image

Integer.Name: SgmP2Edge
Integer.ToolTip: The SGM P2 penalty parameter for larger disparity changes, where at a detected edge in the image
Integer.Description: The SGM P2 penalty parameter for larger disparity changes, where at a detected edge in the image

Command.Name: FlushOutputQueue
Command.ToolTip: Flush the GenTL output queue of all data streams to discard all queued frames.
Command.Description: Flush the GenTL output queue of all data streams to discard all queued frames.
